name: Still on the Shelf
description:
Are you hungry? Still on the Shelf is an endless runner game where your objective is to eat as many donuts (and peppers) as possible before hitting more boring stuff, like an evil bread or a POT.

Controls:

Hit Spacebar to start running
Z to jump
Down arrow + Z to get to a lower platform

Made by:

Eduardo Ribeiro - Programmer / Game designer
Calzone407 - Programmer
Lost Blizzard - Programmer
Parven - Tech-art
ZEST - Artist / Game designer
Breeze - Artist
Sarmen95 - Composer
